00120 extern pascal OSStatus CFQArrayCreateMutable(CFMutableArrayRef *result);
00121         // Creates an empty CFMutableArray that holds other CFTypes.
00122         //
00123         // result must not be NULL.
00124         // On input, *result must be NULL.
00125         // On error, *result will be NULL.
00126         // On success, *result will be an empty mutable array.

00129 extern pascal OSStatus CFQArrayCreateWithDictionaryValues(CFDictionaryRef dict, CFArrayRef *result);

00131         //
00132         // dict must not be NULL.
00133         // result must not be NULL.
00134         // On input, *result must be NULL.
00135         // On error, *result will be NULL.
00136         // On success, *result will be an array.

00169         // 
00170         // str must not be NULL
00171         // On input,  cStrPtr must not be NULL
00172         // On input, *cStrPtr must be NULL
00173         // On error, *cStrPtr will be NULL
00174         // On success, *cStrPtr will be a C string that you must free

00177 #pragma mark * ***** Bundle Routines
00178 
00179 extern pascal OSStatus CFQBundleCreateFromFrameworkName(CFStringRef frameworkName, 
00180                                                                                                                 CFBundleRef *bundlePtr);
00181         // This routine finds a the named framework and creates a CFBundle 
00182         // object for it.  It looks for the framework in the frameworks folder, 
00183         // as defined by the Folder Manager.  Currently this is 
00184         // "/System/Library/Frameworks", but we recommend that you avoid hard coded 
00185         // paths to ensure future compatibility.
00186         //
00187         // You might think that you could use CFBundleGetBundleWithIdentifier but 
00188         // that only finds bundles that are already loaded into your context. 
00189         //
00190         // frameworkName must not be NULL
00191         // On input,    bundlePtr must not be NULL
00192         // On input,   *bundlePtr must be NULL
00193         // On error,   *bundlePtr will be NULL
00194         // On success, *bundlePtr will be a bundle reference that you must free
00195 
00197 #pragma mark * ***** Dictionary Path Routines
00198 
00199 extern pascal OSStatus CFQDictionaryGetValueAtPath(CFDictionaryRef dict, 
00200                                                                                                    const void *path[], CFIndex pathElementCount, 
00201                                                                                                    const void **result);
00202         // Given a dictionary possibly containing nested dictionaries, 
00203         // this routine returns the value specified by path.  path is 
00204         // unbounded array of dictionary keys.  The first element of 
00205         // path must be the key of a property in dict.  If path has 
00206         // more than one element then the value of the property must 
00207         // be a dictionary and the next element of path must be a 
00208         // key in that dictionary.  And so on.  The routine returns 
00209         // the value of the dictionary property found at the end 
00210         // of the path.
00211         //
00212         // For example, if path is "A"/"B"/"C", then dict must contain 
00213         // a property whose key is "A" and whose value is a dictionary. 
00214         // That dictionary must contain a property whose key is "B" and 
00215         // whose value is a dictionary.  That dictionary must contain 
00216         // a property whose key is "C" and whose value this routine 
00217         // returns.
00218         //
00219         // dict must not be NULL.
00220         // path must not be NULL.
00221         // pathElementCount must be greater than 0.
00222         // result must not be NULL.
00223         // On success, *result is the value from the dictionary.
00224 
00225 extern pascal OSStatus CFQDictionaryGetValueAtPathArray(CFDictionaryRef dict, 
00226                                                                                                    CFArrayRef path, 
00227                                                                                                    const void **result);
00228         // This routine is identical to CFQDictionaryGetValueAtPath except 
00229         // that you supply path as a CFArray instead of a C array.
00230         //
00231         // dict must not be NULL.
00232         // path must not be NULL.
00233         // path must have at least one element.
00234         // result must not be NULL.
00235         // On success, *result is the value from the dictionary.
00236         
00237 extern pascal OSStatus CFQDictionarySetValueAtPath(CFMutableDictionaryRef dict, 
00238                                                                                                    const void *path[], CFIndex pathElementCount, 
00239                                                                                                    const void *value);
00240         // This routines works much like CFQDictionaryGetValueAtPath 
00241         // except that it sets the value at the end of the path 
00242         // instead of returning it.  For the set to work, 
00243         // dict must be mutable.  However, the dictionaries 
00244         // nested inside dict may not be mutable.  To make this 
00245         // work this routine makes a mutable copy of any nested 
00246         // dictionaries it traverses and replaces the (possibly) 
00247         // immutable nested dictionaries with these mutable versions. 
00248         //
00249         // The path need not necessarily denote an existing node 
00250         // in the nested dictionary tree.  However, this routine 
00251         // will only create a leaf node.  It won't create any 
00252         // parent nodes required to holf that leaf.
00253         //
00254         // dict must not be NULL.
00255         // path must not be NULL.
00256         // pathElementCount must be greater than 0.
00257 
00258 extern pascal OSStatus CFQDictionarySetValueAtPathArray(CFMutableDictionaryRef dict, 
00259                                                                                                    CFArrayRef path, 
00260                                                                                                    const void *value);
00261         // This routine is identical to CFQDictionarySetValueAtPath except 
00262         // that you supply path as a CFArray instead of a C array.
00263         // 
00264         // dict must not be NULL.
00265         // path must not be NULL.
00266         // path must have at least one element.
00267 
00268 extern pascal OSStatus CFQDictionaryRemoveValueAtPath(CFMutableDictionaryRef dict, 
00269                                                                                                    const void *path[], CFIndex pathElementCount);
00270         // This routines works much like CFQDictionarySetValueAtPath 
00271         // except that it removes the value at the end of the path. 
00272         //
00273         // Unlike CFQDictionarySetValueAtPath, this routine requires 
00274         // that path denote an existing node in the nested dictionary 
00275         // tree.  Removing a non-existant node, even a leaf node, 
00276         // results in an error.
00277         // 
00278         // dict must not be NULL.
00279         // path must not be NULL.
00280         // pathElementCount must be greater than 0.
00281         
00282 extern pascal OSStatus CFQDictionaryRemoveValueAtPathArray(CFMutableDictionaryRef dict, 
00283                                                                                                    CFArrayRef path);
00284         // This routine is identical to CFQDictionaryRemoveValueAtPathArray 
00285         // except that you supply path as a CFArray instead of a C array.
00286         // 
00287         // dict must not be NULL.
00288         // path must not be NULL.
00289         // path must have at least one element.
00290

00294 typedef pascal void (*CFQPropertyListDeepApplierFunction)(CFTypeRef node, void *context);
00295         // A callback function for CFQPropertyListDeepApplyFunction.
00296 
00297 extern pascal void CFQPropertyListDeepApplyFunction(CFPropertyListRef propList, 
00298                                                                                                         CFQPropertyListDeepApplierFunction func,
00299                                                                                                         void *context);
00300         // Calls "func" for every node in the property list.
00301         // 
00302         // propList must not be NULL.
00303         // func must not be NULL.
00304 
00305 extern pascal Boolean CFQPropertyListIsLeaf(CFTypeRef node);
00306         // Given a node in a property list, this routine returns 
00307         // true if the node is a leaf (ie not a dictionary or an 
00308         // array).
00309 
00310 typedef pascal void (*CFQPropertyListShallowApplierFunction)(CFTypeRef key, CFTypeRef node, void *context);
00311         // A callback function for CFQPropertyListShallowApplyFunction. 
00312         // 
00313         // node must be an element of either a dictionary or an array. 
00314         // If node is an element of a dictionary, key is its key within 
00315         // the dictionary.  If node is an element of an array, key 
00316         // is a CFNumber of its index in the array.
00317 
00318 extern pascal void CFQPropertyListShallowApplyFunction(CFPropertyListRef propList, 
00319                                                                                                            CFQPropertyListShallowApplierFunction func,
00320                                                                                                            void *context);
00321         // Calls "func" for every node in the first level of the 
00322         // property list.  propList must be either a dictionary 
00323         // or an array.  To continue to lower levels, "func" should 
00324         // call CFQPropertyListApplyFunctionShallow again (only if 
00325         // CFQPropertyListIsLeaf is false).
00326         // 
00327         // propList must not be NULL.
00328         // func must not be NULL.
00329 
00330 extern pascal OSStatus CFQPropertyListCreateFromXMLFSRef(const FSRef *xmlFile, CFPropertyListMutabilityOptions options, CFPropertyListRef *result);
00331         // Creates a property list based on the XML in the file.
00332         //
00333         // xmlFile must not be NULL
00334         // result must not be NULL
00335         // *result must be NULL
00336         // on success, *result will be a valid property list
00337         // on error, *result will be NULL
00338         
00339 extern pascal OSStatus CFQPropertyListCreateFromXMLCFURL(CFURLRef xmlFile, CFPropertyListMutabilityOptions options, CFPropertyListRef *result);
00340         // Creates a property list based on the XML in the file.
00341         //
00342         // xmlFile must not be NULL
00343         // result must not be NULL
00344         // *result must be NULL
00345         // on success, *result will be a valid property list
00346         // on error, *result will be NULL
